Name: Memories
About the game: A story of him and her. You can control both of them. Figure out what happend to them by collecting papers in the game world. And find a way out. Game Feature Double Main Characters: Explore levels with them and switch character whenever you want. Pazzles: Pick,combine,think,then use.Solve puzzles. Special abilities: Each charactor has different abilities and gain more by story. Multiple endings: Promote the plot by different action,which leads to a different end. Some part of this story based on actual events with artistic exaggeration
